text.author: Jonathan Munn
text.title: Doesn't it make you just want to sneeze?
text.summary: A protagonist and his friend Pete try to get a fairy out of the protagonist's nose, and finally succeed when they realize that the protagonist can make a wish for the fairy to leave.
